definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: The security guard of the apartment did not enter the Visa Office of the South Korean Embassy.
sentences.chinese: 公寓保安人員沒有進入韓國駐華使館領事部。

sentences.english: Many of these people are guards who must sleep outside.
sentences.chinese: 其中很多人是保安人員，必須睡在外面。

sentences.english: There are security guards everywhere, patrolling in vehicles and on motorbikes.
sentences.chinese: 到處都是乘坐車輛或摩托車巡邏的保安人員。

sentences.english: The procession came to a halt and security rushed to the trouble spot.
sentences.chinese: 行進隊伍停下來，保安人員衝向了事發地點。

sentences.english: He had the bouncers throw them out of the club.
sentences.chinese: 他叫保安人員把他們轟了出去。

sentences.english: They overpowered security guards and made their way onto the runway in four vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 他們制服了保安人員，然後乘四輛車奔機場跑道。

sentences.english: They got in disguised as a security guards.
sentences.chinese: 他們裝扮成保安人員混了進去。

sentences.english: He escaped by disguising himself as a security.
sentences.chinese: 他裝扮成保安人員逃跑了。

sentences.english: He had the guards throw them out of the club.
sentences.chinese: 他讓保安人員把他們轟出了俱樂部。

sentences.english: The guy who let me out reproved him.
sentences.chinese: 那位讓我下飛機的保安人員責備他。

sentences.english: The security officer should not club any suspect who does not resist arrest.
sentences.chinese: 保安人員對任何沒有拒捕的嫌犯都不該用棍棒毆打。

sentences.english: I arrange in-house training for my security personnel.
sentences.chinese: 本公司爲保安人員安排內部訓練。

definition: to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
(of police etc) to stop (sb) for inspection/to pull (sb) over
Kanting township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
